definition: not to be repeated/not to be taken as a precedent/just this once
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
(negative prefix)/not/no
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
example/precedent/rule/case/instance

sentences.english: My decision does not constitute (ie should not be regarded as) a precedent.
Make a promise to your team or peers to act differently.
sentences.chinese: 向你的团队或同仁承诺，下不为例。

sentences.english: We're going to look into the root cause of the failures, get it resolved once for all.
sentences.chinese: 准备深入调查失效的根本原因，保证下不为例。

sentences.english: I will let you off this time. Do not let it happen again.
sentences.chinese: 这次我就饶了你，但下不为例。

sentences.english: I'll overlook it this time, but don't do it again.
sentences.chinese: 我这次可以不计较，但下不为例。

sentences.english: It must be clearly understood that, in so doing, we are not establishing a precedent.
sentences.chinese: 必须明确理解，我们这样做是下不为例的。

definition: to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
lit. to punish a little to prevent a lot (idiom); to criticize former mistakes firmly to prevent large scale repetition
to do one's best/to shape up/to behave/to fend for oneself/you're on your own
a person of great moral stature does not remember the offenses committed by one of low moral stature
pinyin: da4 ren2 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4

definition: to keep one's promise/to mean what one says
to forgive easily/to let off lightly (often with negative: you won't get away with it)
to recognize one's mistakes and be able to reform oneself (idiom)
One who does not know is not guilty/If one does not know any better, one cannot be held responsible
to repeat a crime/persistent offender
to forget and not bear recriminations (idiom); to let bygones be bygones/There is no point in crying over spilt milk.
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: to know that one is in the wrong (idiom)
magnanimous (idiom); generous
lit. to eat one's words/to break a promise/to go back on one's word/to renege/unsworn testimony
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
